run.script:
source .env
# node --inspect-wait ./packages/msar/dist/bin/msar.js ...
msar download --stdoutLevel all -u --logFilePath ./var/download.log --logRequests "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields username)" -p "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields password --reveal)" --sso $SSO --outputPath "$OUT" --pretty "$DOWNLOAD"
